page.title: 15SETTLEMENT IN THE AREA
page.content: THE AREA IS A RURAL ONE, WITH A SERIES OF VILLAGES AND HAMLETS. GREAT BENTLEY IS THE LARGEST OF THE VILLAGES, WITH A POPULATION OF OVER 1000. IT CAN TRACE ITS ORIGINS BACK TO EARLY SAXON TIMES. SOME ARTEFACTS DISCOVERED DATE BACK TO THE STONE AGE. IT IS A WIDELY SPREAD VILLAGE WHICH HAS DEVELOPED AT THE CENTRE OF A CROSSROADS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE 45 ACRE GREEN. THE OLDER HOUSING IN AROUND THE GREEN, WITH NEWER HOUSING ESTATES ADJACENT. THERE ARE SHOS FOR BASIC NEEDS, TOGETHER WITH DOCTORS SURGERY. THE SURROUNDING SETTLEMENTS ARE ALL SMALLER, ONLY A FEW HUNDRED PEOPLE EACH. THEY HAVE LIMITED FACILITIES A SHOP OR PUB. IN ALL CASES COLCHESTER IS THE MAIN CENTRE FOR MANY THING INCLUDING HOSPITAL TREATMENT,MAJOR SHOPPING, DENTIST, HIGHER EDUCATION AND LEISURE.
